channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Third Post
item.description: And my third post to see how it formats relative to the others I’ve written so far. After this one I’ll have to see how it changes if I add a main _index.md for general front matter.

item.title: My Second Post
item.description:
This is the second post. I’m trying to make it with a leaf-branch and see if that works. That’ll be best for me with regards to getting images and stuff organized.

I need to find out how to enable wordwrapping in Zed, because writing like this on one giant line is going to drive me nuts.

I’ll need to figure out how to post images too. Like this one!

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post. Hopefully it works this time. I had no luck with this on my desktop, and had no idea why.
